alert.note: Alert for Boone County Except Southwest; Marion (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 02 at 5:58PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Marion and northern Boone Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 557 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Myrtle, or near Harrison, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Harrison... Diamond City... Bergman... Lead Hill... Myrtle... Self... Willis... Crumpler Subdivision... South Lead Hill... Bear Creek Springs... Hopewell in Boone County... Ridgeway... Burlington... Peel... Bull Shoals Lake... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
